name: Rhodium Group SAS
goal:
The company is an independent company, in France and abroad, offering research and analysis services for various private and public sector clients
(including, but not limited to, public administrations, foundations and other Think Tanks). The company combines research and analysis of economic data, and a detailed understanding of public policy dynamics, to help its clients better understand global trends. Its main areas of expertise are the economic, social and political developments in the so-called "Bries" countries, the emergence of these "Bries" countries as world powers, as well as energy and climate, and the big changes in the developed economies.
interests: Climate Action, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Trade
